root.name: Scooby-Doo and the Cyber Chase
root.description: Plot In Scooby-Doo and the Cyber Chase, Scooby and the Gang find themselves in cyberspace, with a new villain - The Phantom Virus. Gameplay The game has 18 levels, in which you find clues, explore different locales such as a mine, and other places from the direct-to-video film.
